sources.title: Black Devil Doll From Hell(1984) EXTENDED VERSION DVD RIP
sources.description: WARNING: THIS MOVIE REALLY SUCKS! WARNING: NUDITY AND SEXUAL CONTENT ADULTS ONLY! 18+ NO COMMENTARY AUDIO! THIS IS THE FULL MOVIE WITH ITS ORIGINAL AUDIO!Â  PLOT: A woman buys a doll at a magic shop. Unbeknownst to her, the doll is possessed by an evil spirit, and it proceeds to take her over.

metadata.Plot: A woman buys an antique doll at a thrift store and does not realize that it is cursed. The doll uses its powers to seduce her while she is asleep and then escape back to the store. She starts to lose interest in sexual activities with her partners as the doll is able to give her a much better satisfaction, so she sets out to find it, but with deadly consequences.
metadata.Actors: Shirley L. Jones, Ricky Roach, Chester Tankersley, Marie Sainvilvs
